thread.title: Watch: PC killed himself after Cregan murdered his colleagues
thread.title_full: Watch: PC killed himself after Cregan murdered his colleagues | Granada - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Watch: PC killed himself after Cregan murdered his colleagues
text:
The inquest into a former police officer who took his own life after being deeply affected by the murder of two of his colleagues concluded today.
Andrew Summerscales became depressed and suffered post traumatic stress disorder after he was one of the first officers on the scene when the police officers Fiona Bone and Nicola Hughes were killed by Dale Cregan.
He was found hanged just before the fourth anniversary of their murders. We'll be talking to a former detective about the traumas police officers can face during their careers after this report from our correspondent Elaine Willcox:
 Manchester
